People of the Flame, Ogre <cf>They live strongly in the harsh wilderness <cf>They have large bodies with horns and tails.
They were belligerent and respected the strong, <cf>and with their outstanding strength and stamina, <cf>they risked their lives to fight for the weak and their friends.
Pukulipo, the People of Flowers<cf>Their fluffy, lovely little bodies <cf>living for pleasure in a town of picture-book colors.
Born with strong magical powers and dexterity, they are more passionate about creating <cf>fun than fighting</cf>.
People of the Wind, the Elves <cf>love nature and live together with the forest <cf>they have a lovely appearance with small wings on their backs.
They respect tradition and prestige,<cf> have learned deeply about the reason of the world,<cf> and have produced many excellent spellcasters.
People of the Earth, the Dwarves<cf> who live with the earth, benefiting from its majestic mountains<cf> and have small bodies and large ears.
With their high technology and strong desires, <cf>they have built several advanced civilizations<cf>with their natural dexterity and speed.
Weddie, the People of the Water<cf> who live freely on beautiful islands in the sea<cf> and whose bodies are colored like the blue surface of the water.
They hate bondage and cherish song and love, <cf>using their traits of speed and strength, <cf>they only fight seriously when protecting their loved ones.
